sections.summary:
Transitioning Military Professional eager to apply acquired skills to serve Aflac and the healthcare industry. Creates business partnerships and
builds trust with managers and employees to create a positive work environment through networking. Driven professional who effectively builds
loyalty, long-term relationships and promoting the company's brand.
